attributes.action: Legalise medicinal and recreational Cannabis in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
The legalisation of cannabis would have multiple benefits. Some are listed below:

- Regulation ensures the safety of cannabis users.
- Decreased criminal convictions related to cannabis.
- Taxation = government revenue.
- The undeniable medicinal benefits of cannabis.
- Allows freedom of liberty.
- Increased tourism.

These are the main reasons as to why the legalisation of cannabis for medicinal and recreational use should occur.
attributes.background: Discuss and hold a vote in Parliament on the legalisation of medicinal and recreational cannabis.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551846
